summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the Prefect agent’s integration with its execution infrastructure, covering flow run submission, work queue and work‑pool handling, priority ordering, error handling, and logging behavior.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and reliability of the Prefect agent’s run submission logic so that workflows are dispatched to appropriate queues or pools, respect priority rules, and gracefully handle failures, thereby ensuring robust orchestration of automated processes.
